items.title: What is RPE?
body: RPE = Rating of Perceived Exertion
RPE helps a lot with programming strength, cardio and other types of workouts
For example, programming 3x3 deadlift is not enough as it doesn't have enough information
If your 1 RM deadlift is 200 kg then 3x3 with 180 kg will feel like 8.5-9 RPE while 3x3 with 150 kg will feel like RPE 5
As you can see there is a huge difference between different RPEs
table: Pushing hard at the end of WOD
Pushing hard in the 2nd half of WOD
Pushing hard at close to PR pace
Everyday PR, repeatable with long rest

items.title: How to active premium?
body: Create account, confirm email and login
Select membership on bottom of Premium page
Follow PayPal instructions (some countries doesn't require to create PayPal account but WTC recommends to do so)
Your premium status will be automatically renewed with every new payment

items.title: How to cancel payment? (if you have PayPal account)
body: Log in to your PayPal account
Click Settings near the top of the page
Click Payments
Click Manage pre-approved payments
Click Cancel or Cancel automatic billing and follow the instructions

items.title: How to cancel payment? (if you don't have PayPal account)
body: Log in to your WTC account
Click Feedback
Say you want to cancel premium account and click send
If you no longer has access to WTC account, use this form and specify as much as you can about your account so your reccuring payment can be found and stopped
You can also contact PayPal directly and request payment cancellation, more info here

items.title: How to create user account?
body: Click Sign In button on top of the page
Click Register button on left side of card to switch to registration
Fill in your email and password
Confirm registeration by clicking right Register button
Check your email for confirmation link
Click confirmation link which redirects to the https://wodtimecalculator.com/#/confirm?token=$token$&tokenId=$tokenId$`
After your email is confirmed login again
Finish account registration by setting up username and answering a few additional questions

items.title: How to change password/retrieve lost password?
body: Click Sign In button on top of the page
Fill in your email address
Click 'Reset password? (fill email first)'
Check your email for reset password button
Click reset password link which redirects to the https://wodtimecalculator.com/#/reset?token=$token$&tokenId=$tokenId$
Create new password
Confirm it by clicking on Set New Password button

items.title: How to change your username?
body: Make sure you are logged in to your account
Visit your profile page
Click on pencil icon on Personal Information card
Select new username and click Update button
Wait for green button confirmation

items.title: How to delete your account?
body: Make sure you are logged in to your account
Send a message using feedback tool and your account will be manually deleted
